name: Scallop & Peach Ceviche
recipeIngredient: 3 peaches (stoned and chopped into small pieces),
recipeInstructions: 1. Slice each scallop horizontally into four disks,
2. Place the scallop slices into a bowl with the lime juice and zest, peaches, tarragon, and a pinch of salt.
3. Stir, cover with cling film and put in the fridge for 20 minutes.
